This morning we are finally starting to see some notable price drops on the latest M5 iPad Pro lineup. We spotted the 256GB and 1TB 11-inch models hitting new Amazon all-time lows, and now you can add the mid-tier 512GB model to the mix as it also just shy of $200 off the list price.

items.title: SeatGeek and Spotify team up to offer concert ticket sales inside the music platform
items.summary: This is a strategic win for SeatGeek. With direct placement in the Spotify app, SeatGeek is positioned to reach millions of active music fans as they discover upcoming events, increasing the chances of converting listeners into ticket buyers.

items.title: Walmart offers 50% savings on the Dyson V9 Motorbar cordless stick vacuum + 4 accessory tools at $300, more
items.summary:
Over at Walmart, you can currently find the Dyson V9 Motorbar Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner at $299.99 shipped, which is only available in a used condition from Amazon while the brand’s direct website is completely out of stock. It’s down from its $600 MSRP here, and has been seeing a few short-lived falls to this rate in 2026. While we’ve seen it go lower in the past, this is still a solid $300 markdown that lands the price at the second-best rate we have tracked since Cyber Monday ended (which is when we last saw the $250 low appear). You can shop a number of alternate Dyson vacuum deals from Walmart on the landing page here.
